name: Candied Hearts
description:
“Candied Hearts is a visual novel game based on Hansel and Gretel. As the Wicked Witch, take care of these children until the Solstice Ceremony and, hopefully, don’t grow too attached!”

To play the game, just download the zip file, unzip it, and run the CandiedHearts.exe file. Hope you enjoy!

Please note: The game is still in development. Only the first day is available to play.
